mapper.select: select appointment_id, appointment_time, appointment_status, patient_id, employee_id, branch_id, appointment_price, appointment_pay_time from appointment

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, branch.branch_id, branch.branch_name, branch.department_id, appointment.appointment_id, appointment.appointment_time, appointment.appointment_status, appointment.patient_id, appointment.employee_id, appointment.branch_id, appointment.appointment_price, appointment.appointment_pay_time FROM employee , branch , appointment WHERE appointment.employee_id = employee.employee_id AND appointment.branch_id = branch.branch_id AND appointment.patient_id = #{patientId} order by appointment.appointment_pay_time desc

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, branch.branch_id, branch.branch_name, branch.department_id, appointment.appointment_id, appointment.appointment_time, appointment.appointment_status, appointment.patient_id, appointment.employee_id, appointment.branch_id, appointment.appointment_price, appointment.appointment_pay_time FROM employee , branch , appointment WHERE appointment.employee_id = employee.employee_id AND appointment.branch_id = branch.branch_id AND appointment.appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
mapper.insert: insert into appointment(appointment_time, appointment_status, patient_id, employee_id, branch_id, appointment_price, appointment_pay_time) values (#{appointmentTime}, #{appointmentStatus}, #{patientId}, #{employeeId}, #{branchId}, #{appointmentPrice}, #{appointmentPayTime})
mapper.update:
update appointment
appointment_time = #{appointmentTime},
appointment_status = #{appointmentStatus},
patient_id = #{patientId},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
branch_id = #{branchId},
appointment_price = #{appointmentPrice},
appointment_pay_time = #{appointmentPayTime},
where appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
